arts.ttl: 'Freshness through the door' will help lift Watford says Cleverley
arts.sum: Tom Cleverley was pleased to end the losing run but said he didn't enjoy watching it and needs 'freshness through the door' to lift his squad.
How the game unfolded in Wales as Vakoun Bayo's late header salvages a point from a poor performance.

The evening's opening chance came inside the opening 5 minutes, as Alex Robertson capitalised on a mistake by Ryan Porteous, picking up the ball just inside the half and drove toward the Watford defence. After picking up the ball from Robertson, he cut inside onto his right and drew a fingertip save from the Watford keeper, who pushed it away for a corner.

arts.ttl: Watford stop the rot as Vakoun Bayo nets late equaliser
arts.sum: Cian Ashford looked to have fired Cardiff to victory until the striker’s late intervention.

arts.ttl: Cardiff City 1-1 Watford: Bluebirds throw two points away as late Bayo leveller cancels out Ashford strike
arts.sum: The Bluebirds welcomed the Hornets to the Welsh capital and drew 1-1

arts.ttl: Player’s move to Watford is now ‘imminent’ – Talent likelier to get regular game time
arts.sum: Watford are currently ninth in the Championship, but are only three points from the play-off spots. Key signings can elevate the Hornets’ chances of earning promotion to the Premier League and it now seems as if they are close to making an addition to the side.
